short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add and view notes for YouTube playlists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Playlist Notes is a simple tool that lets you add custom notes within any YouTube playlist. 

This is just a prototype.

Current features:
- Add personal notes to any YouTube playlist.

Upcoming features:
- Add personal notes to any YouTube video.
- Easily mark important videos in playlists to highlight them.

Privacy: This extension does not track or share your data; everything is stored locally on your device.
